duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing high-quality, efficient care to residents, including personal hygiene, medication support, repositioning, toileting, and vital signs monitoring.
Observing and reporting on residents' health, escalating any problems efficiently and effectively.
Providing emotional support and comfort for residents and their loved ones.
Recognizing abnormal changes in body functioning and reporting to a supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, 2 years of experience in a hospital or clinical setting, and valid, unrestricted LPN certification or State/Local equivalent required.
